quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Lives and Country
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, egypt, conflict. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On this date, very often assumed as the formal beginning of World War II in Europe, Germany invaded Poland.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1 September 1939

questions.question: This island, situated in central Mediterranean Sea, was most heavily bombed in the period 1940-1942 when Italy challenged the British supremacy of the Mediterranean.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Malta

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Susan first appeared as Kristen Blakes what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Impostor

questions.question: Roosevelt, Stalin and Churchill made important decisions about the consequences of the World War II, at which famous Conference?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Yalta Conference

questions.question: After the success of  Operation Weserubun which began on 9 April 1940, this European country was occupied by German troops.  Both the government and the king remained in the country during its occupation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Denmark

questions.question: The attack on Pearl Harbor, which took place in December 1941, was carried out by which Asian country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Japan

questions.question: Susan, from the soap opera Days of our Lives, can be described as what?

options.text: A hateful old hag that never took a bath
Fun-loving, sweet, simple-minded with less-then-perfect features
A great person to have as a best friend

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fun-loving, sweet, simple-minded with less-then-perfect features

questions.question: Which of the following territories was not severely bombed by the Anglo-American forces during World War II?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yugoslavia

questions.question: Mel Gibson has stated in an interview that he has this health disorder.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bipolar disorder

questions.question: The Manhattan Project, a scientific research project during World War II, was aimed at quickly creating what kind of weapon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Atomic bomb

questions.question: Operation Barbarossa was the largest invasion during World War II, whereby Germany attempted to occupy which country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Russia

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Lawrence Alamain is this persons brother.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Black

questions.question: A conflict between which two Asian countries became the Pacific part of the Second World War?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: China and Japan

questions.question: Which strategic part of Egypt was so important to the Italians, that they started the North African Campaign in 1940?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Suez Canal

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Susan Banks is the ex-wife of this man.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Black

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Lives and Days
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, hell, opera. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Samantha Gene Brady of  Days of our Lives, was born on this date.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: October 19, 1984

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Susan kept these two persons locked up in a secret room in the wine cellar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlena and Kristen

questions.question: The day of Belles Christening, all hell broke loose on Days of our Lives.  In front of the entire congregation, she tearfully confessed that she had had an affair with John.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlena

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, who is Sami Brady half-sister of?

options.text: Carrie Brady, Isabella Brady, and D.J. Craig

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carrie Brady, Isabella Brady, and D.J. Craig

questions.question: In the Days of our Lives, Susan sought psychiatric help from which Doctor (without mentioning any names to her of course)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlena

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Sami Brady went down to the Titan Offices and witnessed John and Marlena doing this on the table in the conference room.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Making love

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives,  Kristen Blake walked into Dr. Robbins office pretending to be pregnant by wearing what object?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pillow

questions.question: In Days of our Lives, Susan had been hired by Stefano to take Kristens place at the doctor appointments and in the delivery room. She would then give her baby to who?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kristin

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, what did Marlena give Sami for her 17th birthday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A diamond pendant

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Belle was kidnapped from her crib by this person.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sami

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, who is the twin brother of Sami Brady?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Brady

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, when Susan would not leave Salem, Kristen threatened to burn down what place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Graceland

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Susan would sometimes get out her doll, named this, and pretend she was her baby.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lisa Marie

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, a few months after his birth, Eric Brady was kidnapped by whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stefano DiMera.

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, Carrie was somewhat disfigured after suffering burns on her face as a result of what?

options.text: Grease popping in her face as she cooked
Acid being thrown at her face
Her home burning down and her narrowly escaping

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Acid being thrown at her face

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Lives and Days
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, people, codename. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who was commander of the Japanese warplanes that carried out the attack on Pearl Harbor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chuichi Nagumo

questions.question: In the soap opera Days of our Lives, around the time Sami decided to seek advice from her ill mother, Marlena was in the hospital fighting a case of this disease.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anemia

questions.question: In Days of Our Lives, Hopes mother, Addie, had been suffering from this disease during her pregnancy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leukemia

questions.question: What was the aim of the North African Campaign, which took place from September 13, 1940 to May 13, 1943?

options.text: To split Allied forces in two

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To make Egypt Italian possession

questions.question: In Days of Our Lives, Belle joined her fellow teens on a trip to Puerto Rico, where Shawn and Philip went on an adventure to find some missing jewels, including a ruby belonging to her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alice Horton

questions.question: After World War II, Central and Eastern European communist countries formed which of the following organizations?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Warsaw pact

questions.question: It was publicly announced that on January 1, 2000 all California bars, clubs, and card rooms must be smoke-free.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In Days of our Lives, Sami had to marry Austin in order to get Will back.  They were married in Carrie and Austins hotel room using this couples wedding bands.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Abe  Lexies

questions.question: In Days of our Lives, how did Roman die?

options.text: He died while on a mission for the ISA
Marlena paid someone to shoot him so she could be with John

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He died while on a mission for the ISA

questions.question: How many people are estimated to have died in World War II?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: About 60 million

questions.question: Even though Japan had been fighting China since 1937, historians consider this date the start of World War II.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1 September 1939

questions.question: Which countries were invaded by Germany in Operation Weserubung in 1940?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Denmark and Norway

questions.question: What was the codename of the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima in 1945?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Boy

questions.question: What is the name of the German invasion of the Soviet Union, which began on 22 June 1941?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Operation Barbarossa

questions.question: Which event provoked the Second Sino-Japanese War?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Japans occupation of Manchuria

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Stand and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What does Vern accidentally drop, while the boys are walking on the train tracks in the movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a comb

questions.question: Call me Ishmael.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moby-Dick

questions.question: What year did the movie Stand By Me come out in the movie theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1986

questions.question: The hit movie Stand By Me is based on one of Stephen Kings short stories.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Academy Award-winning actor Richard Dreyfuss appeared in the hit movie Stand By Me.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What actor played the role of Chris Chambers in the hit movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: River Phoenix

questions.question: Who directed the popular movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob Reiner

questions.question: There were four of us.

options.text: The Idle Thoughts of an Idle Fellow

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Three Men in a Boat

questions.question: Does actor John Cusack appear in the hit movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What was the name of the bully in the blockbuster movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ace Merrill

questions.question: What are the boys looking for in the hit movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a dead body

questions.question: What actor played the role of the troubled teen Teddy Duchamp in the hit movie Stand By Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Corey Feldman

questions.question: It was on April 14, 2000 that an US F-15 accidentally shot 2 U.S. helicopters down over Iraq killing 26 people.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Stand By Me, what is the nickname of the boy who wins the Pie Eating Contest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lardass

questions.question: In the movie Stand By Me, Gordie is getting chased by a dog and has to climb a fence. What is the name of the dog?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chopper

quizzes.title: History Quiz: Disease and Truth
quizzes.description: Test your history knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering History, englands, mean. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This happened in 1932, when the state penitentiary was still at Cold Mountain. And the electric chair was there, too, of course.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Green Mile

questions.question: Name the most lethal outbreak in human history with an estimated 50 to 100 million people killed worldwide between 1918 and 1919. As many as 25 million may have been killed in the first 25 weeks!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spanish flu

questions.question: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

options.text: guably the best of his works, Tolstoy severely criticizes the highest circles of Russian society through this tragic love story of two of its members, one of them being Alexei Vronsky.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anna Karenina

questions.question: One version of this rare brain disorder is better known as Mad Cow and can be contracted by eating contaminated beef. There is no known cure.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease

questions.question: It can hardly be a coincidence that no language on Earth has ever produced the expression as pretty as an airport.

options.text: is typical for author Douglas Adams, this 1988 detective novel begins with a humorous and unusual line, grabbing attention from the very first sentence.
The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy
The Restaurant at the End of the Universe
The Long Dark Tea-Time of the Soul

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Long Dark Tea-Time of the Soul

questions.question: What does bonjour mean in French?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hello

questions.question: No one would have believed, in the last years of the nineteenth century, that human affairs were being watched keenly and closely by intelligences greater than mans and yet as mortal as his own; that as men busied themselves about their affairs they were scrutinized and studied, perhaps almost as narrowly as a man with a microscope might scrutinize the transient creatures that swarm and multiply in a drop of water.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The War of the Worlds

questions.question: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pride and Prejudice

questions.question: Named after a river region in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, the symptoms of this viral disease include: red eyes, bleeding from orifices, and organ failure.  The disease causes a type of hemorrhagic fever and the fatality rate is often 90%.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ebola

questions.question: Complete these lyrics from the song Summer Nights, featured on the soundtrack of the movie Grease:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 10 oclock

questions.question: People diagnosed with this disease have an insatiable urge to eat non-food substances like dirt, paper, glue and clay.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pica

questions.question: What is the meaning of oui in French?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: It was a pleasure to burn.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fahrenheit 451

questions.question: If you really want to hear about it, the first thing youll probably want to know is where I was born, and what my lousy childhood was like, and how my parents were occupied and all before they had me, and all that David Copperfield kind of crap, but I dont feel like going into it, if you want to know the truth.

options.text: ing one of the most controversial and widely disputed literary works of the 20th century, this novel by J. D. Salinger has been banned several times in the United States for inappropriate and immoral content.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Catcher in the Rye

questions.question: It is estimated that the Black Death wiped out 1/4 of Englands population, totaling 4.2 million from 1347 to 1351.  What is the name of this bacteria thought to have been responsible for this plague?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yersinia pestis

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Love and Life
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, mean, revoir. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What does the French expression au revoir mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bye

questions.question: In French, what does non mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: There are only four questions of value in life. What is sacred? Of what is the spirit made of? What is worth living for? What is worth dying for? The answer to each is the same. Only love. (1995)

options.text: Ten Things I Hate About You

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Don Juan DeMarco

questions.question: What does “escargot” mean in French?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snail

questions.question: Which of these is the French word for fish?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Poisson

questions.question: I came here tonight because when you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible. (1989)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When Harry Met Sally

questions.question: What is the meaning of the French word pour?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: For

questions.question: Love has given me wings so I must fly. (2001)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Knights Tale

questions.question: What is the French word for cat?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chat

questions.question: Which of these expressions will you use to thank somebody in French?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Merci

questions.question: I would rather be a ghost drifting by your side as a condemned soul than enter heaven without you. Because of your love, I will never be a lonely spirit. (2000)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon

questions.question: What is the meaning of the French word “chien”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dog

questions.question: Love? Above all things I believe in love! Love is like oxygen! Love is a many splendored thing, love lifts us up where we belong, all you need is love!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moulin Rouge

questions.question: It doesnt matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other. (1997)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Good Will Hunting

questions.question: I have crossed oceans of time to find you. (1992)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dracula
